name: OPEN-WA Easy API
description: A simple way to convert your WA account to an API. Open the URL at the path `/api-docs/`.

WA_SESSION_DATA.description: The Base64 encoded string of the session.data.json file. This heroku app is designed to be stateless so you no session details survive a redployment. Run `npx @open-wa/wa-automate --disable-spins -o` to generate a session.data.json file.

API_KEY.description: The api key which will be used to authenticate API requests. If you do not set this manually it will be generated and available to see in the logs..
